); context.Instance.TraceInformation ("ODBC Business Error Business Publisher - Publishing error for Transaction ID " + ESBError.TransactionID + " to ODBC Database"); sql += "<Statement type=\"Text\" sql=\"INSERT INTO [ErrorLog] (ErrorType, ESBTopic, ESBAction, TransactionID, MessageDate, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage, OriginalMessage) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)\">"; sql += "<Parameters>"; sql +=
